Private, shared history channel created by Kim Morrison. Description:

(private) Coordination for the ItaLean 2025 workshop. (Moderated by Pietro Monticone.)
Kim Morrison changed the access permissions for this channel from Private, shared history to Private, protected history.

(private) Coordination for the ItaLean 2025 workshop. (Moderated by Pietro Monticone.)
